content: light up your holidays with edie this adorable little bulb is the perfect way to add handmade sparkle to your tree this low-sew beginner ish pattern is incredibly quick to make and can be worked up in multiple colors to create a whole string of personalized lights edie is the easiest and cutest ornament you ll hang this year **materials** this pattern uses medium weight beginner easy peasy yarn in your favorite color red yellow green and blue are traditional dark green black pink 2 × 10mm safety eyes stuffing 4mm hook scissors darning/tapestry needle **terms & techniques** this pattern uses u s terms and is completed in the round unless otherwise noted rounds r magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet increase increase invisible decrease decrease back loop only blo fasten_off invisible fasten_off embroidery
